critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing a labor dispute. It expresses concern about potential disruption to interstate commerce and establishes a board to investigate the dispute. The language is formal and legalistic. Initial scores: Joy: 1 (no joy conveyed), Sadness: 2 (slight concern), Fear: 3 (concern about disruption), Disgust: 1 (no disgust conveyed), Surprise: 1 (no surprise conveyed).
